attributes.action: Seize the opportunity of the Cockermouth floods to create Hydro Electric schemes in the Lake District
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Hoover Dam produces 2.8 million Kilowatts of power and can store 2 years of flow from the Colorado River.  The Lake District is an ideal site for major Hydro Electric schemes which could possibly prevent further floods.
